website_summaries.verdict: Timeless style in a modern quartz timepiece. Affordable elegance meets accurate timekeeping.
pros: Dressy classic watch with date functionality
Features a unusual silver dial with Roman numerals and a brown leather band
cons: Style may seem too old fashioned

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch, hate the band.
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch, hate the clasp. This is a handsome, elegant watch and it looks great on me. But the mechanism for putting it on my arm and securing the leather band discourages use.
customer_reviews.author: David Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, bargain basement ?
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a new watch but boy was I wrong. This watch was used. The strap had wear marks on it, the box it came in was put back together with scotch tape. None of the tags were on the the watch and on top of everything the warranty cards was missing. The only reason I give it two stars is because I like the looks of the watch. I’ve returned more merchandise to Amazon because the items have been used. This used merchandise is going back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Minor scratches on back, otherwise great watch
customer_reviews.text: I just received this watch. After unwrapping the watch face I noticed two surface scratches on back as well as a red line. The line I was able to wipe off, but are surface scratches acceptable or expected? I’m not sure if I should return this or if it’s likely the new one will also have scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good watch reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Tissot's are very good watches. This one came with the best type of leather band; it has a metal buckel which saves the leather at the visual holes. One more star if it had the day too.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: All the wonderful attention to detail one would expect from a Tissot
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous entry-level Swiss quartz watch. All the wonderful attention to detail one would expect from a Tissot. Great heritage to the brand. The genuine leather band is not of the highest quality and will take a while to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good quality , very nice watch but I just don’t know yet if my bf likes the watch ? It’s Christmas present for him and he haven’t open my presents yet🤕🙄😔
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, purchased as a gift. However the band is stiff and the closure system is a little annoying at times.
customer_reviews.author: TheJos

customer_reviews.title: Great watch; great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this watch! Beautiful, classic looking time piece. The transition clasp on the back is helpful as well for those with bigger wrists.
customer_reviews.author: G.O.A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Decent watch.
customer_reviews.text: The face is very big. I have a big wrist and it still looks huge on mine. It is also very thin so it's good to wear under shirt cuff. The strap is however a giant pain to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Steelius

customer_reviews.title: Great Tissot
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable watch looks even better in person than the pictures. I strongly recommend it to anybody who wants a very elegant watch and not break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie M

customer_reviews.title: It was absolutely perfect! The leather strap is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch as a present to my father on my wedding day. It was absolutely perfect! The leather strap is very comfortable. The face of the watch is the perfect size. My father loved it and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kieffner

customer_reviews.title: Great watch from Swiss at a very affordable price
customer_reviews.text: It was a present to my very old mother. Large face. Large Roman numerals. Deployment buckle. Great watch from Swiss at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I received it yesterday and I love it it was a gift to my husband and he really is in love :)
customer_reviews.author: Yocana

customer_reviews.title: Great for about a week
customer_reviews.text: The watch was fantastic for the time that it worked. Unfortunately it stopped working entirely after about a week or so. Swapped out the battery and still no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: The USPS delivery was horrible then first time I went to put this watch ...
customer_reviews.text: The USPS delivery was horrible then first time I went to put this watch on the band keeper is broken
customer_reviews.author: Chad gibson

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch so much! I am glad I chose this one, it get's complements all the time :)
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Exactly as per specification and photos
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Exactly as per specification and photos. Would recommend it as a good dress watch. Received before estimated delivery date from supplier.
customer_reviews.author: VDodhia

customer_reviews.title: It is new and delays again and again
customer_reviews.text: I am totally disappointed. This watch delays again and again. I have just bought it 2 months ago!!! It was not a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Xavier

customer_reviews.title: I love it although my wife said it is too classic
customer_reviews.text: I love it although my wife said it is too classic. It was delivered as it was described. For that price it is perfect watch with high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very classy watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and was very impressed with the quality. Looks very classy.
customer_reviews.author: Radhika B

customer_reviews.title: The watch is beautiful - love the look
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful - love the look, weight, size, color and etc. but don't care for the watch clip. I prefer the old-fashioned buckle. But other than that, it is perfect and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple wristwatch within 200$ good option from Tissot.
customer_reviews.author: Shreyashi

customer_reviews.title: It should be original, only without international warranty, ...
customer_reviews.text: It should be original,only without international warranty,but it's ok then if the product is real.
customer_reviews.author: ociean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it very much, in good and simple style, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wang

customer_reviews.title: others are good.
customer_reviews.text: the watch belt was a little tight .others are good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: may look better on someone with larger wrists
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because the 42mm face was just too big for such a simple design. made the watch look extremely loud on my 7-1/4" wrist. may look better on someone with larger wrists. I did enjoy the design and make of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent V Kanago

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch, but...
customer_reviews.text: Watchband is unusually short for this style of clasp closure (deployment style). This watch is quite difficult to fit around one's hand to your wrist. Possibly, should have options on watchband size? Otherwise, a very nice watch
customer_reviews.author: VICKI KOEBLITZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my boyfriend - absolutely gorgeous in person! He says that he is often offered compliments on his watch!
customer_reviews.author: Maeven

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff!
customer_reviews.text: Tissot watch became useless in less than 3 months, and now it says I can’t return it! It’s certainly a knockoff! I don’t know what to do! Please contact me, I want to return this! I can’t event contact the seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch but the brown leather band is far too dark.
customer_reviews.text: The watch face and casing are beautiful. The watch has a simple elegance that goes quite well with business and formal wear. My only complaint is the deep colored brown brand; it is quite literally almost black. I will be switching the band out for a more tan or havana colored leather band, which I feel would be much more complementary to the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

product_meta.title: Tissot Men's T0636101603800 Tradition Analog Display Swiss Quartz Brown Watch
product_meta.description:
The Tissot Tradition family gives ultra-modern watchmaking a hint of nostalgia with a vintage-style perfectly balanced with classical details and subtle finishes. These are complemented by design elements such as guilloche decoration on bracelet models and a gently curved case. A classic men's watch that will remain timeless piece on his wrist.



 For more than 150 years, Tissot has embodied the innovation and tradition of Swiss watch-making. Based in the Neuchâtel area of the Jura Mountains, in Le Locle, Switzerland, Charles-Félicien Tissot and his son Charles-Emile created the watch making company Tissot in 1853. Whether in the technology of its movements, in the research for special materials or in the very functions of the watch itself, Tissot's engineers and watchmakers have developed pioneering timepieces over the years. 

 Some of Tissot's triumphs over the years include the the Idea 2001 (the world's first plastic watch) released in 1971, the Rock watch (which set the timepiece's movement in a stone case made from Swiss Alps granite) in 1985, and the Wood watch from 1988 (with a completely wooden case). Tissot uses the best movements (from ETA SA Manufacture Horlogère Suisse), the highest quality materials (316L steel, 18K gold, titanium) and scratch-proof glasses (sapphire crystal--at least 2500 Vickers). 

 The company has been involved with high profile sports events since 1974 when they sponsored a racing car in the 24 Hours of Le Mans, France. Since then Tissot's timepieces have been chosen as official timekeepers for world championships in cycling, motorcycling, fencing and ice hockey. And Tissot is currently the the official watch and timekeeper of NASCAR. 

 Tissot timepieces have been worn by a bevy of celebrities over the years--including Grace Kelly, Elvis Presley and Nelson Mandela--and James Stewart's character L.B. Jefferies wore a Tissot timepiece in Alfred Hitchcock's "Rear Window." Today the company is represented in a variety of sporting fields by English soccer star Michael Owen, IndyCar driver Danica Patrick, and MotoGP world champion Nicky Hayden. Today, Tissot is a member of the Swatch Group, the world's largest watch producer and distributor. 



Stainless steel case with a brown leather strap. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Silver dial with silver-tone hands and alternating index and Roman numeral hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim.

See more
